snippet: In “The People to Come,” a dance project from the choreographer Yanira Castro, audience members are invited to submit sketches, photos, patterns or suggested tasks that inspire dance solos.
abstract: Choreographer Yanira Castro's The People to Come dance project invites audience members to submit sketches, photographs, patterns or suggested tasks to inspire dance; five dancers will each create two 19-minute solos based on submitted material at New York premiere at Invisible Dog Center in Cobble Hill, Brooklyn.
lead_paragraph: In “The People to Come,” a dance project from the choreographer Yanira Castro, audience members are invited to submit sketches, photos, patterns or suggested tasks that inspire dance solos.

headline.main: A Game of Chance (Audience Spins First)
headline.print_headline: A Game of Chance (Audience Spins First)
